mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.PARENT_ITEM_CODE PARENT_ITEM_CODE, a.ITEM_ID ITEM_ID FROM ad_balance_target_value a LEFT JOIN report_item b ON a.ITEM_ID = b.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN (select PARENT_ITEM_CODE, REPORT_ITEM_ID FROM report_item_instance WHERE `YEAR`=#{year} AND `MONTH`=#{month} GROUP BY REPORT_ITEM_ID) c ON b.ID = c.REPORT_ITEM_ID WHERE a.year=#{year} AND a.month=#{month} AND c.PARENT_ITEM_CODE='流动资产' OR a.year=#{year} AND a.month=#{month} AND c.PARENT_ITEM_CODE='流动负债'
